modern:
skinparam state {
  BackgroundColor #FFFFFF
  BorderColor #00BFFF
  FontColor #2F4F4F
  FontName Segoe UI
  RoundCorner 15
  BorderThickness 1
  Shadowing false
}

skinparam arrow {
  Color #00BFFF
  FontColor #2F4F4F
  Thickness 1
}
elegant:
skinparam state {
  BackgroundColor #F5F5F5
  BorderColor #2F4F4F
  FontColor #2F4F4F
  FontName Garamond
  FontStyle italic
  BorderThickness 1
  Shadowing true
}

skinparam arrow {
  Color #2F4F4F
  FontColor #2F4F4F
  Thickness 1
}
vintage:
skinparam state {
  BackgroundColor #F5DEB3
  BorderColor #A0522D
  FontColor #8B4513
  FontName Bookman Old Style
  FontStyle italic
  BorderThickness 1
  Shadowing false
}

skinparam arrow {
  Color #A0522D
  FontColor #8B4513
  Thickness 1
}
highcontrast:
skinparam state {
  BackgroundColor White
  BorderColor Black
  FontColor Black
  FontName Arial
  FontSize 14
  BorderThickness 2
  Shadowing false
}

skinparam arrow {
  Color Black
  FontColor Black
  FontSize 12
  Thickness 2
}
